DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy and safety of a combination therapy of rosuvastatin and ezetimibe versus monotherapy of rosuvastatin in hypercholesterolemia patients
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of a Combination Therapy of Rosuvastatin and Ezetimibe Versus Monotherapy of Rosuvastatin in Hypercholesterolemia Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate efficacy and safety of a combination therapy of rosuvastatin and ezetimibe versus monotherapy of rosuvastatin in hypercholesterolemia patients
DOC.criteria: Hypercholesterolemic patient Has history of hypersensitivity to HMGCoA reductase inhibitor and Ezetimibe
